reviewText: Excellent production! Pioneer really did this one right. I mostly purchased this for Pat but was _very_ pleased with the whole concert.  If you like anything that Dejohnette, Hancock and Metheny have done then you must check this out. Holland was a special surprise to say the least. It really is that good.
Title: N/A

reviewText: If you're a fan of either the Pat Metheny Group or Jack DeJohnette in Keith Jarrett's Standards trio, you won't necessarily like the music this superstar quartet plays. It's much closer in style to Metheny's 'Question & Answer' CD, which was recorded in the year preceding this concert. Add in Hancock's unique keyboards style and it's a very acquired taste.I saw this quartet perform at the Royal Festival Hall in London in the year this DVD was recorded. I was actually sitting behind the band, which was an unusual but involving experience.This was possibly the last occasion that the British audience saw Metheny's long, bushy hair in its natural silvery state. On his return, it had acquired a mysterious auburn sheen.The DVD notes mention the fact that this quartet weren't getting on with each other in the early days of the tour. By the time of the recording, they were clearly coping with one another, but I wouldn't put it more strongly than that. To my knowledge, none of them has recorded much with any of the others in the 15 years since.So get this as a document of four jazz superstars, each playing well if not their very best, a selection of tunes, only one of which is a true jazz great.
summary: Not to everyone's taste, but good, all the same
Title: N/A

reviewText: I bought this dvd not knowing exactly what to expect, I love Herbie Hancock and Pat Metheny, I honestly did know the other guys but was delighted with the over all mix and feeling these guys have together!The over all feeling I got was of a rainy misty day in some magical garden. I truly was able to just sit back and relax taking it all in. Quality of sound and video is outstanding. I have seen both Pat Metheny and Herbie Hancock live. This dvd most definatly captures them at their best. I Would say to anyone who even has a slight intrest in this type of music to check this dvd out .......
summary: Great mix of people on this dvd !
Title: N/A

reviewText: If I never see another Concert in DVD again, I'll be glad that I picked up this one. This is for people who just love strait-ahead Jazz. The minute I sat down and watched it, I called my friend (J.C) and told him, "don't ask any questions, just go on Amazon.Com and pick this one up, you won't regret this one."Jack DeJohnette, Hancock, Metheny and Holland, put together some pieces here that will send you thru the roof. The Audio Sound is Great, despite it not being DTS. None-the-less, this is a must in your collection.  It really does not get any better than this. RIGHT ALONGSIDE "CASINO LIGHTS 99"

reviewText: four Bad Cats bringing there chops&Depth on stage this is where it's at for me.one of those performances where you feel the chemistry&Overall Musical Bound coming together to create a strong union of the musical Minds.
summary: get this as soon as possible

reviewText: All I have to say is those of you who are Pat Metheny fans buy this DVD not just for him, but the first song "Shadow Dnace" by Dave Holland. He absolutely comes out of his "shell," and projects an insane, uncompromising, freak-out....oh and the other musicians are okay...just kidding.Fantastic DVD with brilliant performances and excellent audio and video quality.
summary: Oh My! How Disturbing This Is and Worth Every Penny!!!
